resources.string:
LocaLocal is designed to help travelers to discover hidden gems in Malaysia with little or no planning at all by sharing relevant and contextual information at the right time. 

We aim to provide an ease of mind during travel by facilitating payment and trip scheduling in just a few taps.

Alpha version:

Beta version will be up with ability to book and pay relevant tours. LocaLocal aims to be the only travel app you need for Malaysia in 2015, to achieve that, we hope to get as many feedback from you as possible to continue improving. 

Sincerely,
Melvin and Fern Yit
